front.title: The ANTACID Replication Service: Rationale and Architecture

abstract.t: This memo presents the ANTACID Replication Service, which replicates hierarchically named repositories of XML documents for business- critical, internetworked applications. ASCII and HTML versions of this document are available at http://www.codeontheroad.com/papers/draft-schwartz-antacid- service.txt and http://www.codeontheroad.com/papers/draft-schwartz- antacid-service.html, respectively.
